summary: global health diplomacy (GHD) has become an important field of investigation due to health concerns increasingly entering the foreign policy domain. there is little knowledge about what has been driving Chile’s integration of health into foreign policy. but there is little effort to appropriate knowledge from international relations theories to better grasp the emergence of GHD. electronic supplementary material The online version of this article (10.1186/s12992-018-0428-8) contains supplementary material. additional files Additional file 1: (112.8KB, docx) Flow Diagram. Contains details of the broad search strategy used in this paper.
